name: Wondership Q
description: Wondership Q is a 2D action RPG with sandbox elements. You play as the protagonist of this story who’s suddenly been turned into a cat by a witch. Fly through the air on your very own airship, solve mysteries, and craft until your heart’s content!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows (7, 8/8.1, 10)  Processor: 2.0 Ghz Memory: 2500 MB RAM Graphics: Video Memory 128 MB DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 1500 MB available space Additional Notes: Shader Model 2.0+ / OpenGL 3.0+
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows (7, 8/8.1, 10)  Processor: Dual-Core 3.0 Ghz Memory: 4000 MB RAM Graphics: Video Memory 256 MB DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 1500 MB available space Additional Notes: Shader Model 2.0+ / OpenGL 3.0+
